refsection.title: Note
refsection.para: This is generally only accessible as a subcommand of exec1, to eliminate conflicts with the standard command by this name. It is referred to without qualification in this manual for simplicity.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: unvis decodes either the contents of filename(s) or, if none are supplied, its standard input; to its standard output. Decoding is as if by the unvis2 library function with no MIME or HTTP decoding enabled.

Tools that produce output encoded this way include list-process-table1 and list-logins1. Files encoded this way include (on the BSDs) fstab5. Such encoded flat table data can be reliably handled by awk1 and mlr1, avoiding problems where fields might themselves contain whitespace, to be decoded to a human-readable form at final output time by unvis.
